title: The Little Fox Who Lost His Tail
description: Little Fox is having a very unusual day. He has lost something very important to himâ€”his tail! Join Little Fox on his adventures as he searches for his missing tail.Little Fox has lost his tail! Can you help him find it? Children can lift the flaps to help Little Fox find his missing tail. Is it in the closet? Can it be in the attic? Where could it be? Filled with adorable illustrations by Jedda Robaard, this amusing, interactive adventure is perfect for parents and children to share.
author: Jedda Robaard
